ability.Mirror Armor: Bounces back only the stat-lowering effects of moves.
ability.Steel Clad: Reduces damage taken from super-effective moves by 25%.

Steel Wing.effect: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1 stage.

Mirror Shield.effect: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.

Sky Dive.effect: User takes recoil damage equal to 1/3 of the damage dealt.

Body Press.effect: Damage is calculated using the user's Defense stat as its Attack, including stat stage changes.

Taunt.effect: Prevents the target from using non-damaging moves for its next three turns. Pokemon with the Oblivious Ability or protected by the Aroma Veil Ability are immune.
